name: INActivateCarSignalIntentResponse
desc: Your app’s response to a request to activate a car’s signals.

items.name: init(code: INActivateCarSignalIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity.

items.name: var code: INActivateCarSignalIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code indicating success or failure when confirming or handling an intent.

items.name: enum INActivateCarSignalIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Constants indicating the status of the response.

items.name: var signals: INCarSignalOptions
items.desc: The type of signal produced (audible or visual).
